Posts.Content: ANGELLOVESROB wrote: i JUST WENT BACK TO THE DOCTOR TODAY AFTER ULTRASOUND AND MAMMAGRAM-NO CLEAR RESULTS-MY DOCTOR SAID EVEN IF IT'S NOT CANCER IT NEEDS TO BE REMOVED-I'M TRYING TO BE CALM AND PATIENT BUT INSIDE I'M DIEING,THANKS FOR LISTENING,PLEASE PRAY-MY BEST FRIEND JUST GOT DIAGNOSED THIS WEEK AND SHE HAS CANCER-I DONT KNOW WHAT TO THINK ANYMORE-THIS HAS NEVER HAPPENED TO ME BEFORE,SORRY FOR RAMBLING ON!
